(septemb 2012) mammoth cave nation park iucn categori ii (nation park) rotunda room mammoth cave locat edmonson, hart, barren counties, kentucky, u.s. nearest&#160;c brownsvil coordin 37°11′n 86°6′w﻿ / ﻿37.183°n 86.100°w﻿ / 37.183; -86.100coordinates: 37°11′n 86°6′w﻿ / ﻿37.183°n 86.100°w﻿ / 37.183; -86.100 area 52,830 acr (21,380&#160;ha)[1] establish juli 1, 1941 visitor 508,054 (in&#160;2012)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic unesco world heritag site type natur criteria vii, viii, x design 1981 (5th session) reference&#160;no. 150 state parti &#160;unit state region europ north america mammoth cave nation park u.s. nation park central kentucky, encompass portion mammoth cave, longest cave system known world. offici name system mammoth-flint ridg cave system ridg cave formed. park establish nation park july&#160;1, 1941. becam world heritag site october&#160;27, 1981, intern biospher reserv september&#160;26, 1990. park' 52,830 acr (21,380&#160;ha) locat primarili edmonson county, kentucky, small area extend eastward hart counti barren county. center green river, tributary, nolin river, feed green insid park. 400 mile (640&#160;km) survey passageway mammoth cave far world' longest known cave system, twice long second-longest cave system, mexico' sac actun underwat cave.[3][4] content 1 limeston labyrinth 2 visit 3 histori 3.1 prehistori 3.2 earliest known histori seri 10.3 archaeolog 10.4 geolog 11 extern link limeston labyrinth[edit] mammoth cave develop thick mississippian-ag limeston strata cap layer sandstone, make system remark stable. known includ 390 mile (630&#160;km) passageway;[5] new discoveri connect add sever mile figur year. mammoth cave nation park establish preserv cave system. upper sandston member known big clifti sandstone: thin, spars layer limeston interspers within sandston give rise epikarst zone, tini conduit (cave passag small enter) dissolv natur acid groundwater. epikarst zone concentr local flow runoff high-elev spring emerg edg ridges. resurg water spring typic flow briefli surfac sink underground elev contact sandston caprock underli massiv limestones. underli massiv limeston layer human-explor cave region natur developed. limeston layer stratigraph column beneath big clifty, increas order depth ridgetops, girkin formation, ste. geneviev limestone, st. loui limestone. example, larg main cave passag seen histor tour locat bottom girkin top ste. geneviev formation. bottomless pit mammoth cave, woodcut, 1887 (nuno carvalho de sousa collection, lisbon) primari layer limeston divid name geolog unit subunits. one area cave research involv correl stratigraphi cave survey produc explorers. make possibl produc approxim three-dimension map contour variou layer boundari without necess test well extract core samples. upper sandston caprock rel hard water penetrate: except vertic crack occur. protect role mean mani older, upper passag cave system dry, stalactites, stalagmites, format requir flow drip water develop. however, sandston caprock layer dissolv erod mani locat within park, frozen niagara room. "contact" limeston sandston found hike valley bottom ridgetops: typically, one approach top ridge, one see outcrop expos rock chang composit limeston sandston well-defin elevation.[6] one valley bottom southern region park, massiv sinkhol developed. known "cedar sink," sinkhol featur small river enter one side disappear back underground side. mammoth cave home endang kentucki cave shrimp, sightless albino shrimp. visiting[edit] ranger-guid tour cave nation park servic offer sever cave tour visitors. notabl featur cave, grand avenue, frozen niagara, fat man' misery, seen light tour rang one six hour length. two tours, lit visitor-carri paraffin lamps, popular altern electric-lit routes. sever "wild" tour ventur away develop part cave muddi crawl dusti tunnels. lectur deliv nation park servic cave guid vari tour, take sever tour visitor learn differ facet cave' formation, cave' human histori prehistory. echo river tour, one cave' famou attractions, use take visitor boat ride along underground river. tour discontinu logist environment reason earli 1990s.[7] mammoth cave headquart visitor' center locat mammoth cave parkway. parkway connect kentucki rout 70 north kentucki rout 255 south within park.[8] history[edit] prehistory[edit] world heritag site plaqu stori human be relat mammoth cave span six thousand years. sever set nativ american remain recov mammoth cave, nearbi cave region, 19th 20th centuries. mummi found repres exampl intent burial, ampl evid pre-columbian funerari practice. except purpos burial discov 1935 remain adult male discov larg boulder. boulder shift settl onto victim, pre-columbian miner, disturb rubbl support it. remain ancient victim name "lost john" exhibit public 1970s, inter secret locat mammoth cave reason preserv well emerg polit sensit respect public display nativ american remains. research begin late 1950 led patti jo watson washington univers st. louis, missouri done much illumin live late archaic earli woodland peopl explor exploit cave region. preserv constant cave environment, dietari evid yield carbon date enabl watson other determin age specimens, analysi content, also pioneer watson, allow determin rel content plant meat diet either cultur period span sever thousand years. analysi indic time transit hunter-gather cultur plant domest agriculture. anoth techniqu employ archaeolog research mammoth cave "experiment archaeology", modern explor sent cave use technolog employ ancient cultur whose leftov implement lie discard mani part cave. goal gain insight problem face ancient peopl explor cave, place research similar physic situation. ancient human remain artifact within cave protect variou feder state laws. one basic fact determin newli discov artifact precis locat situation. even slightli move prehistor artifact contamin research perspective. explor properli train disturb archaeolog evidence, area cave remain out-of-bound even season explorers, unless subject trip archaeolog research area. besid remain discov portion cave access histor entranc mammoth cave, remain cane torch use nativ americans, well artifact drawings, gourd fragments, woven grass moccasin slipper found salt cave section system flint ridge. though undeni proof exist use cave, evid use past archaic period. expert scientist answer is, make one greatest mysteri mammoth cave day. earliest known history[edit] 31,000-acr (13,000&#160;ha) tract known "pollard survey" sold indentur september&#160;10, 1791 philadelphia william pollard. 19,897 acr (8,052&#160;ha) "pollard survey" north bank bacon creek green river purchas thoma lang, jr., british american merchant yorkshire, england june&#160;3, 1796, £4,116/13s/0d (£4,116.65). land lost local counti tax claim war 1812. legend first european discov mammoth cave either john houchin brother franci houchin, 1797. hunting, houchin pursu wound bear cave' larg entranc open near green river. houchin famili tale john decatur "johnni dick" houchin discover cave, highli unlik johnni dick 10 year old 1797 unlik hunt bear tender age. father john like candid branch famili tree, probabl candid discover mammoth cave franci "frank" houchin whose land much closer cave entranc brother john's. also argument brother charl houchin, known great hunter trapper, man shot bear chase cave. shadow charles' claim fact resid illinoi 1801. contrari stori brucker watson' longest cave, assert cave "certainli known time." cave area known discoveri entranc mammoth cave. even franci houchin cave entranc land near bend green river known turnhole, less mile main entranc mammoth cave. land contain histor entranc first survey regist 1798 name valentin simons. simon began exploit mammoth cave saltpet reserves. accord famili record pass houchin, later henderson families, john houchin bear hunt bear turn began chase him. found cave entranc ran cave protect charg bear. 19th century[edit] map mammoth cave 1897, pen r. e: call partnership valentin simon, variou individu would land war 1812, mammoth cave' saltpet reserv becam signific due british blockad unit states' ports. blockad starv american militari saltpet therefor gunpowder. result, domest price saltpet rose product base nitrat extract cave mammoth cave becam lucrative. juli 1812, cave purchas simon owner charl wilkin investor philadelphia name hyman gratz. soon cave mine calcium nitrat industri scale. half-interest cave chang hand ten thousand dollar (a huge sum time). war price fell, work abandon becam minor tourist attract center nativ american mummi discov nearby. wilkin die estate' executor sold interest cave gratz. spring 1838, cave sold gratz brother franklin gorin, intend oper mammoth cave pure tourist attraction, bottom long sinc fallen saltpet market. gorin slave owner, use slave tour guides. one slave would make number import contribut human knowledg cave, becom one mammoth cave' celebr histor figures. stephen bishop, african-american slave guid cave 1840 1850s, one first peopl make extens map cave, name mani cave' features. stephen bishop introduc mammoth cave 1838 franklin gorin. gorin wrote, bishop' death: "i place guid cave – celebr great stephen, aid make discoveries. first person ever cross bottomless pit, he, anoth person whose name forgotten person ever bottom gorin' dome knowledge. "after stephen cross bottomless pit, discov part cave known beyond point. previou discoveries, interest center known 'old cave' ... mani point littl known, although stephen wont say, 'grand, gloomi peculiar'."[9] mammoth cave kentucky. illustr manual (1897) 1839, john croghan louisvil bought mammoth cave estate, includ bishop slave previou owner, franklin gorin. croghan briefli ran ill-fat tuberculosi hospit cave, vapor believ would cure patients. widespread epidem period, tuberculosi would ultim claim live bishop croghan. throughout 19th century, fame mammoth cave would grow cave becam intern sensation. time, cave attract attent 19th centuri writer robert montgomeri bird, rev. robert davidson, rev. horac martin, alexand clark bullitt, nathaniel parker willi (who visit june 1852), bayard taylor (in may 1855), william stump forwood (in spring 1867), naturalist john muir (earli septemb 1867), rev. horac carter hovey, others.[10] result grow renown mammoth cave, cave boast famou visitor actor edwin booth (hi brother, john wilk booth, assassin abraham lincoln 1865), singer jenni lind (who visit cave april&#160;5, 1851), violinist ole bull togeth gave concert one caves. two chamber cave sinc known "booth' amphitheatre" "ole bull' concert hall". 1859, louisvil nashvil railroad open main line cities, colonel larkin j. procter own mammoth cave estate. also own stagecoach line ran glasgow junction (park city) mammoth cave estate. line transport tourist mammoth cave 1886, establish mammoth cave railroad. earli 20th century: kentucki cave wars[edit] river styx cave boat tour difficulti farm life hardscrabble, poor soil cave countri influenc local owner smaller nearbi cave see opportun commerci exploitation, particularli given success mammoth cave tourist attraction. "kentucki cave wars" period bitter competit local cave owner tourist money. broad tactic decept use lure visitor away intend destin privat show caves. mislead sign place along road lead mammoth cave. typic strategi earli day automobil travel involv repres (known "cappers") privat show cave hop aboard tourist' car' run board, lead passeng believ mammoth cave closed, quarantined, cave otherwis inaccessible. 1906, mammoth cave becam access steamboat construct lock dam brownsville, kentucky. 1909, max kämper, young german mine engineer, arriv cave way new york. kämper graduat technic colleg famili sent trip abroad graduat present. origin intend spend two week mammoth cave, kämper spent sever months. assist african-american slave descend ed bishop, kämper produc remark accur instrument survey mani kilomet mammoth cave, includ mani new discoveries. reportedly, kämper also produc correspond survey land surfac overli cave: inform use open entranc cave, soon happen violet citi entrance. croghan famili suppress topograph element kämper' map, known surviv today, although cave map portion kämper' work stand triumph accur cave cartography: earli 1960 advent modern explor period would passag survey map greater accuracy. kämper return berlin, point view mammoth cave country, disappear entirely. turn 21st centuri group german tourists, visit cave, research kämper' famili determin fate: young kämper kill trench warfar world war battl somm 1916. fame french cave explor édouard-alfr martel visit cave three day octob 1912. without access close held survey data, martel permit make barometr observ cave purpos determin rel elev differ locat cave. identifi differ level cave, correctli note level echo river within cave control green river surface. martel lament 1906 construct dam brownsville, point made full hydrolog studi cave impossible. among precis descript hydrogeolog set mammoth cave, martel offer specul conclus mammoth cave connect salt coloss caves: would proven correct 60 year martel' visit.[11] earli 1920s, georg morrison created, via blasting, number entranc mammoth cave land own croghan estate. absent data croghan' secret surveys, perform kämper, bishop, others, publish form suitabl determin geograph extent cave, conclus shown croghan year exhibit portion mammoth cave land owned. lawsuit file and, time, differ entranc cave oper direct competit other. earli 20th century, floyd collin spent ten year explor flint ridg cave system (the import legaci explor discoveri floyd collins' crystal cave explor salt cave) die sand cave, kentucky, 1925. explor sand cave, dislodg rock onto leg tight crawlway unabl rescu die starvation.[12] attempt rescu collin creat media sensation: result public would draw promin kentuckian initi movement would soon result format mammoth cave nation park. nation park movement (1926–1941)[edit] visitor tour mammoth cave descend stair histor (or houchins) entrance. last croghan heir died, advocaci momentum grew among wealthi citizen kentucki establish mammoth cave nation park. privat citizen form mammoth cave nation park associ 1926. park author may&#160;25, 1926.[13] donat fund use purchas farmstead region, tract within propos nation park boundari acquir right emin domain. contrast format nation park spars popul american west, thousand peopl would forcibl reloc process form mammoth cave nation park. often emin domain proceed bitter, landown paid consid inadequ sums. result acrimoni still reson within region.[14] legal reasons, feder govern prohibit restor develop clear farmstead privat associ held land: regul evad oper "a maximum four" ccc camp may&#160;22, 1933 juli 1942.[15][16] accord nation park service, "bi may 22, 1936, 27,402 acr land acquir accept secretari interior. area declar nation park juli 1, 1941 minimum 45,310 acr (over 600 parcels) assembled."[17] superintend hoskin later wrote summer tanag name pete arriv guid hous around everi april&#160;20, start 1938. bird ate food held hand guides, delight visitors, provid food less-tam mate.[18] birth nation park (1941)[edit] mammoth cave nation park offici dedic july&#160;1, 1941. coincidence, year saw incorpor nation speleolog society. r. taylor hoskins, second act superintend old association, becam first offici superintendent, posit held 1951. new entrance, close visitor sinc 1941, reopen december&#160;26, 1951, becom entranc use begin frozen niagara tour.[19] longest cave (1954–1972)[edit] staircas tower mammoth dome 1954, mammoth cave nation park' land hold encompass land within outer boundari except two privat held tracts. one these, old lee collin farm, sold harri thoma hors cave, kentucky, whose grandson, william "bill" austin, oper collin crystal cave show cave direct competit nation park, forc maintain road lead property. condemn purchas crystal cave properti seem matter time. februari 1954, two-week expedit auspic nation speleolog societi organ invit austin: expedit becam known c-3, collin crystal cave expedition.[20] c-3 expedit drew public interest, first photo essay publish robert halmi juli 1954 issu true magazin later public doubl first-person account expedition, cave beyond: stori collin crystal cave expedit joe lawrence, jr. (then presid nation speleolog society) roger brucker. expedit prove conclus passag crystal cave extend toward mammoth cave proper, least exceed crystal cave properti boundaries. however, inform close held explorers: fear nation park servic might forbid explor known.[21] 1955 crystal cave connect survey unknown cave, first connect flint ridg system. particip c-3 expedit wish continu explor past conclus c-3 expedition, organ flint ridg reconnaiss guidanc austin, jim dyer, john j. lehrberg e. robert pohl. organ incorpor 1957 cave research foundation. organ sought legitim cave explorers' activ support origin academ scientif research. notabl scientist studi mammoth cave period includ patti jo watson (see section prehistory.) march 1961, crystal cave properti sold nation park servic $285,000.[22] time, great onyx cave property, remain privat inholding, purchas $365,000. cave research foundat permit continu explor memorandum understand nation park service. coloss cave connect survey salt cave 1960 1961 colossal-salt cave similarli connect crystal-unknown cave, creat singl cave system much flint ridge. 1972, flint ridg cave system survey length 86.5 mile (139.2&#160;km), make longest cave world. flint–mammoth connect (1972)[edit] river styx, one cave' semi-subterranean waterways, emerg onto surfac park. 1960s, cave research foundat (crf) explor map team found passageway flint ridg cave system penetr houchin valley came within 800 feet known passag mammoth cave. 1972, crf chief cartograph john wilcox pursu aggress program final connect caves, field sever expedit flint ridg side well explor lead mammoth cave. juli 1972 trip deep flint ridg cave system, patricia crowther—with slight frame 115 pound (52&#160;kg)—crawl narrow canyon later dub "tight spot", act filter larger cavers. subsequ trip past tight spot august&#160;30, 1972 wilcox, crowther, richard zopf, tom brucker discov name "pete h" inscrib wall river passag arrow point direct mammoth cave.[23] name believ carv pete hanson, activ explor cave 1930s. hanson kill world war ii. passag name hanson' lost river explorers. finally, september&#160;9, 1972, six-person crf team wilcox, crowther, zopf, gari eller, stephen wells, cleveland pinnix (a nation park servic ranger) follow hanson' lost river downstream discov connect echo river cascad hall mammoth cave. link flint ridg mammoth cave systems, "everest speleology" climbed. integr cave system contain 144.4 mile (232.4&#160;km) survey passag fourteen entrances.[24] recent discoveries[edit] connect mammoth cave smaller cave cave system followed, notabl proctor/morrison cave beneath nearbi joppa ridg 1979. proctor cave discov jonathan doyle, union armi desert civil war, later own mammoth cave railroad, explor crf. morrison cave discov georg morrison 1920s. connect push frontier mammoth explor southeastward. river styx time, discoveri made outsid park independ group call central kentucki karst coalit ckkc result survey ten mile roppel cave east park. discov 1976, roppel cave briefli list nation' longest cave connect proctor/morrison' section mammoth cave system september&#160;10, 1983. connect made two mix parti crf ckkc explorers. parti enter separ entranc met middl continu direct exit opposit entrance. result total survey length near 300 mile (480&#160;km). march&#160;19, 2005, connect roppel cave portion system survey small cave eudora ridge, ad approxim three mile known length mammoth cave system. newli found entranc cave, term "hoover entrance," discov september, 2003, alan canon jame wells.[25] increment discoveri sinc push total 400 mile (640&#160;km).[3][5] certain mani mile cave passag await discoveri region. discoveri new natur entranc rare event: primari mode discoveri involv pursuit side passag identifi routin systemat explor cave passag enter known entrances. relat nearbi caves[edit] least two massiv cave system lie short distanc mammoth cave: fisher ridg cave system martin ridg cave system. fisher ridg cave system discov januari 1981 group michigan caver associ detroit urban grotto nation speleolog society.[cit needed] far, cave map 117 mile (188&#160;km).[5] 1976, rick schwartz discov larg cave south mammoth cave park boundary. cave becam known martin ridg cave system 1996 new explor connect nearbi cave whigpistl cave (schwartz' origin entrance), martin ridg cave, jackpot cave. decemb 2008, martin ridg cave system map length 34 mile (55&#160;km), explor continues.[cit needed] biolog ecosystem[edit] follow speci bat inhabit caverns: indiana bat (myoti sodalis), gray bat (myoti grisescens), littl brown bat (myoti lucifugus), big brown bat (eptesicu fuscus), eastern pipistrel bat (pipistrellu subflavus). together, rare bat speci eastern small-foot bat estim popul 9–12 million histor section. speci still exist mammoth cave, number thousand best. ecolog restor portion mammoth cave, facilit return bats, ongo effort. bat speci inhabit cave; red bat (lasiuru borealis) forest-dweller, found underground rarely. anim inhabit cave include: two genera cricket (hadenoecu subterraneus) (ceuthophilu stygius) (ceuthophilu latens), cave salamand (eurycea lucifuga), two genera eyeless cave fish (typhlichthi subterraneus) (amblyopsi spelaea), cave crayfish (orconect pellucidus), cave shrimp (palaemonia ganteri) addition, surfac anim may take refug entranc cave gener ventur deep portion cavern system. misconcept relat mammoth cave system' name[edit] fossil woolli mammoth ever found mammoth cave, name cave noth extinct mammal. rather, name "mammoth" refer larg width length passag connect rotunda insid entrance.[26] name given long cave system' true extent fulli known. modern discoveri proven apt name. even so, mani exampl woolli mammoth discov big bone lick state park kentucki . cultur references[edit] signific amount work american poet donald finkel stem experi cave mammoth cave nation park. exampl includ "answer back," 1968, book-length "go under," publish 1978. layout one earliest comput games, crowther' coloss cave adventure, base partli mammoth cave system. video game kentucki rout zero standalon expans set act iii iv call along echo, fictionalis hotlin number provid inform echo river "drifters" "pilgrims".[27][28] h.p. lovecraft' short stori "the beast cave" set cave. american rock band guid voic referenc cave 1990 song "mammoth cave" album place fli got smashed.[29] park superintendents[edit] robert p. holland; septemb 2, 1936 – june 21, 1938; act r. taylor hoskins; june 22, 1938 – june 30, 1941; act r. taylor hoskins; juli 1, 1941 – march 31, 1951 thoma c. miller; april 1, 1951 – june 30, 1954 perri e. brown; juli 1, 1954 – septemb 14, 1963 paul mcg. miller; septemb 15, 1963 – decemb 30, 1965 john a. aubuchon; januari 2, 1966 – septemb 7, 1968 robert h. bendt; septemb 8, 1968 – januari 23, 1971; assign line supervis abraham lincoln birthplac nation histor site, septemb 2, 1970 – april 27, 1975 joseph kulesza; februari 21, 1971 – may 31, 1976 albert a. hawkins; juli 4, 1976 – august 11, 1979 robert l. deskins; august 12, 1979 – septemb 1, 1984 richard n. strange; septemb 2, 1984 – decemb 8, 1984; act franklin d. pridemore; decemb 9, 1984 – januari 2, 1988 david a. mihalic; januari 3, 1988 – juli 1994[30] ronald r. switzer; march 1995 – januari 2005 bruce powell; januari 2005 – januari 2006; act patrick reed; januari 2006 – 2012 [31] sarah j. craighead; novemb 2012 – present [32] list incomplete.[33][34] see also[edit] carlsbad cavern nation park coloss cavern karst topographi list report". nation park service. retriev decemb 23, 2013.&#160; ^ b vicki carson (februari 15, 2013).
